details.description: ECSA is the premier European conference on Software Architecture targeting advances and breakthroughs in the field.
details.ranking: A CORE conference rank since 2010, ranked according to CORE2023.

submission.procedure: Email submission to SC chair, Paris Avgeriou
requirements: Proposed General Chair (name and short CV)
Preliminary list of supporting organizations (academia, research institutions, industry, etc.)
Initial list of names for potential Program Chair(s) and Organizing Committee members (not binding)

future_dates.note: The conference is held yearly around September.
